company_name: NCC Services Limited. Trading as NCC Group.
page_content:
NCC Services Limited. Trading as NCC Group.

Website Performance Analyser

Ad-hoc Testing tool using-real-browsers, Performance-Analyser provides a-quick-and-easy interface-for-running single or multi-page tests, or for crawling an-entire-website. Results are clearly displayed, and multiple reporting methods enable quick identification of both the slowest and largest pages and their associated assets. This makes it possible to-see-exactly-where different optimisation methods can-be-used to maximum effect.

Features

  • Allow-the-capture of advanced navigation-and-back-end timing metrics
  • Compare the performance of-your pages in-a-range of browsers
  • Test any page on-demand or schedule repeated tests
  • Testing-delivered by-acontrolled environment with-dedicated connectivity
  • Rely-on-our measurements to-show-just-how effective-your optimisation work-has-been
  • Test your whole-site-to identify the worst-performing pages
  • How does-your-site’s performance-measure up-to-the competition?
  • Use-Performance-Analyser tosee-what your-competitors aredoing-to-enhance-their sites performance
  • We can capture a-visual image of-all-the pages you test
  • View those-pages as-an-filmstrip or-a-video

Benefits

  • Shows performance as experienced by-your-end users in real browsers
  • Automation frees-up-your testers from hours of manual performance testing
  • Clearly presents the-advice-and-data needed for front-end performance optimisation
  • Visual representation of-performance clearly communicates issues-to non-technical stakeholders
  • SaaS model means no capital outlay or licencing
  • Reliable data and historical comparison in-line with NCC Group
  • Consistent and repeatable testing methodology
  • An-optimised site-delivers improved customer experience and conversion rates
  • Reducing cost of acquisition and delivery infrastructure

Pricing

£1000 per unit

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Year
